name: Cheeseburger
body:
### Welcome To Our Page.
After placing an order, this App will generate a receipt and email it to the customer.

### Authors and Contributors
George Armstrong, Jack Wild (JackWild2003), Heather Welsh (RvcHeather)

**### Download and install App (Over the Air)**

https://ota.io/kadbas

App testing is open to all RVC faculty, staff, and students.

If you want to test apps, here is what you need you to do:

1) Download and Install UDID Tool App (Free) to your iPhone, iPad, or iTouch.

https://itunes.apple.com/en/app/udid-tool/id377602501

2) After installed, Run the UDID Tool App

3) Click the "Send Email" button

4) Send email to: c.konkol@rockvalleycollege.edu

5) I will send you an email with instructions on how to test the apps. It shouldn't take you a few minutes per app.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
